text: Horsfieldia punctata is a species of plant in the Myristicaceae. It is a tree endemic to Peninsular Malaysia. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Horsfieldia punctata. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
